ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 176
ygData.msgSnippet: ... machine someone posted a pic of? A while ago, the guy that did the EQ Emulator project (the one that got shut down for legal reasons) posted a few pics -
ygData.messageBody:
> What is this ledendary Gnomish Blunderbuss you mention? Was that the flying
machine someone posted a pic
of?

A while ago, the guy that did the EQ Emulator project (the one that got shut
down for legal reasons) posted a few pics - one of them showed a gun of some
sort in the range slot of a gnome, giving rise to the rumors of a gnomish gun of
some kind - after all, if the icon is there in the bmpwad, it might very well be
in the game..

Another pic also showed the gnome flying around, though in reality the "flying
machine" was 2 kiln models used as weapons, making it look like they were
engines/wings of some sort. This is more likely to just be a hack job of moving
models around, rather than an actual item in the game - especially as Brad has
said there will be no flight in the game ('twas in one of the Kunark forums)..
